projects.project_title: CivicSetu — Citizen-led Civic Issue Reporting and Tracking Platform
projects.project_description: CivicSetu is a digital platform that empowers citizens to report local civic issues — such as potholes, broken streetlights, sanitation problems, and infrastructure damage — quickly using GPS location and media uploads. The system generates automated maintenance tickets, enables transparent real-time tracking of complaint status, and fosters faster engagement between residents and authorities for effective resolution.

EduPortal is a web-based Student Management System designed to streamline academic administration for educational institutions. It provides secure student login, personalized dashboards, and centralized access to key academic information. The platform facilitates registration, course tracking, and profile management while enhancing communication between students and administrative staff. Built with a focus on usability and efficiency, EduPortal supports scalable user management for modern campus environments.

projects.project_title: MewDrive — Personal Cloud Storage & File Management System
projects.project_description: MewDrive is a web-based cloud storage and file management platform that enables users to securely upload, organize, and access their files from any device. The system features authenticated login, user-specific folders, and intuitive dashboard navigation for efficient document control. Designed as a scalable digital storage solution, MewDrive enhances personal and professional file accessibility while maintaining data privacy and structured user management.
